attributes.action: look into the delays caused by the criminal records bureau
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have been offered a job, I applied for a crb for the job, it is going to 3 months now, I have no other source of income, I don't have credit cards and I have to pay for my flat, otherwise, I live within my income. I have been tossed around by the crb and this is really affecting my life. I have never been this sad before and this is my 4th crb

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the CRB
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
